subject: Order #SSN4646
description_text:
Hello.

I've order a simsonn break pedal.

The order number is
Order #SSN4646
The pickup number that in received tell me it's still not picked up after 4
days.

Can you confirm me it's the good link ?

Thank you and have nice day.

conversations.body_text: Hi Christophe Jarnoux,    Should this logistics channel become obstructed, we shall dispatch your parcel via UPS courier.

Hello thank you for answering quickly.

May i received the new tracking number by mail in response ?

Best regards.

Le lun. 15 déc. 2025, 08:50, service@simsonn.com
Hi Christophe Jarnoux,  Hello, your order tracking number is UPS: 1ZJ455510400112060，https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=1ZJ455510400112060
